contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German Location |Wappen = Wappen von Kalletal.svg |lat_deg = 52 |lat_min = 07 |lat_sec = 00 |lon_deg = 08 |lon_min = 56 |lon_sec = 59 |Lageplan = Kalletal in LIP.svg |Bundesland = Nordrhein-Westfalen |Regierungsbezirk = Detmold |Kreis = Lippe |Höhe = 214 |Fläche = 112.43 |Einwohner = 14723 |Stand = 2009-06-30 |Gemeindeschlüssel = 05766036 |PLZ = 32689 |Vorwahl = 05264 |Kfz = LIP |Website = [http://www.kalletal.de/ www.kalletal.de] |Bürgermeister = Andreas Karger |Partei = CDU }} '''Kalletal''' is a municipality in the [[Lippe]] district of [[North Rhine-Westphalia]], [[Germany]], with c. 15,300 inhabitants. ==Comprising villages (Ortschaften)== * Asendorf * Bavenhausen * Bentorf * Brosen * Erder * Heidelbeck * Henstorf * Hohenhausen * Kalldorf * Langenholzhausen * Lüdenhausen * Osterhagen * Stemmen * Talle * Varenholz * Westorf == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.kalletal.de/ Official website] {{de icon}} {{Cities and towns in Lippe (district)}} [[Category:Towns in North Rhine-Westphalia]] {{Lippe-geo-stub}} {{Link GA|de}}
